short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Button X is a powerful tool that allows you to create beautiful and stylish web buttons in seconds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just choose a button and play its settings. After you finish the design, click on the button and thats all! Now you can copy & paste necessary CSS properties in your CSS file.

With this tool, you can change the following CSS properties:
- Background gradient colors (CSS3)
- Background solid color
- Font color, size, style and weight
- Border color, size and radius (CSS3)
- Box shadow (CSS3),
- Text shadow (CSS3),
- Padding
